lead_paragraph: Gonzalo Higuain scored his 30th league goal of the season but was later sent off and had to be restrained by his team mates as Napoli lost 3-1 at Udinese on Sunday, severely denting their Serie A title hopes.

headline.print_headline: Livid Higuain Sent Off as Napoli Lose at Udinese
headline.main: Livid Higuain Sent Off as Napoli Lose at Udinese
